repos_data.description: There can be more than Notion and Miro. AFFiNE(pronounced [É™â€˜fain]) is a next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, open-source, customizable and ready to use.
A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.
Focalboard is an open source, self-hosted alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana.
Focalboard is an open source, self-hosted alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana.
Docmost is an open-source collaborative wiki and documentation software. It is an open-source alternative to Confluence and Notion.

Sophisticated AI chatbot with long-term memory capabilities, complete Notion workspace integration, and MCP (Model Context Protocol) implementation. Features semantic, episodic, and procedural memory systems.
